issue.title: Some headers ( ModelDatabase.hh ) are not exported when compiling from source v.2.2

content.raw:
Here is my hypothesis:

The ModelDatabase.{cc,hh} files appeared sometime near to Nov 2013 in [this commit](#!/osrf/gazebo/commits/557fa4b883ca49fa9c11004a0429706b6dbebf13#chg-gazebo/common/CMakeLists.txt). In that commit, the ```CMakeListst.txt``` does not include the installation of ```ModelDatabase.hh```. This is why 2.2.1 and 1.9.x lack of this file.

Why is the file present in 2.2.2? Because we have [included it](#!/osrf/gazebo/commits/3759a7098b6c73e2e01bf5b57dd23ae3d798c862) in pull request #929, dated on Feb 2014.

What to do? Fix 1.9.X branch and release.
content.html:
Here is my hypothesis:

The ModelDatabase.{cc,hh} files appeared sometime near to Nov 2013 in this commit. In that commit, the CMakeListst.txt does not include the installation of ModelDatabase.hh. This is why 2.2.1 and 1.9.x lack of this file.

Why is the file present in 2.2.2? Because we have included it in pull request #929, dated on Feb 2014.

What to do? Fix 1.9.X branch and release.
